data.title: Ralph Bruce McGuire Obituary
data.meta_description: Ralph McGuire of Duncan, born in Collingwood Township on February 14, 1930, a son of the late Bruce and Edna (nee Gekill) McGuire of the 10th Line in Collingwood Township, passed away peacefully at Errinrung Long Term Care in Thornbury on Saturday October 12, 2019 at the age of 89.
data.text:
He was the dearly beloved husband of Dorine (nee Hindle) for 65 years and loving father to Janice and Gail of Wasaga Beach and Glen and Alison of Thornbury and the dear grandpa of Ian and Mason McGuire of Thornbury.

He is survived by his brother Walter (late Birdie) McGuire of Collingwood and brother-in-law Dennis Hindle (late Shirley) of Westhill. He was predeceased by siblings Russell (Jean) McGuire, Marg (Gus) Lentine, Nora (Ken Teed and Harry Booth) and by Vernon McGuire (Freda) and brother-in-law Ron Hindle.

Friends will be received at the Ferguson Funeral Home, 48 Boucher St. E., in Meaford on Sunday October 20th from 2 until 4 o’clock.

A memorial funeral service celebrating Ralph’s life will be conducted at St. Paul’s Presbyterian Church in Thornbury on Monday October 21, 2019 at 11 a.m. with a family service of committal and interment of his cremated remains to follow at Thornbury-Clarksburg Union Cemetery.

If so desired and as your expression of sympathy donations to Errinrung Residents Council (cheques only please) or the Meaford Hospital Foundation would be appreciated. www.fergusonfuneralhomes.ca
